_header: Gods Son that was so free
_description: A song of the Passion with ‘O and I’ refrain — five 12-line stanzas

BodDou126.First Lines:
Godys sone þat was so freIn to þis world he
                    cam…
BodDou126.Last Lines:
…þat þy sone bouȝte dereHe schal me nat for
                    goa
